statements: SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_open_date, ticket_status FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, ticket_open_date FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_resolved_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, ticket_open_date FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY ticket_open_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'OPEN';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_status FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_resolved_date IS NULL ORDER BY ticket_open_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_open_date FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY ticket_open_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_open_date, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'RESOLVED' AND ticket_resolved_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_description LIKE '%urgent%' OR ticket_status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY ticket_open_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_description, ticket_status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT ticket_description, ticket_status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM investment_queries WHERE query_resolution IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_description, ticket_status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, ticket_description FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Closed' OR ticket_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, customer_id FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, query_resolution FROM investment_queries WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT customer_id, query_text, resolved FROM UserQueries ORDER BY query_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, investment_type, amount FROM Investments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Investments JOIN UserQueries ON Investments.customer_id = UserQueries.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, issue_description, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(ticket_id) as ticket_count FROM CustomerSupportTickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING ticket_count > 1;
SELECT query_text FROM UserQueries WHERE resolved = FALSE AND customer_id = 123 ORDER BY query_id;
SELECT * FROM Investments WHERE amount > 10000.00 AND investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) as total_investment FROM Investments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_id, investment_type, investment_amount FROM Investments ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT query_id, query_type, query_description FROM UserQueries WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM ResolvedQueries WHERE resolve_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_status, ticket_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT investment_id, customer_id, investment_type, investment_amount FROM Investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, query_type, query_description FROM UserQueries WHERE query_type = 'Technical' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT query_id, customer_id, query_type, query_description FROM UserQueries UNION ALL SELECT query_id, resolve_date, resolution_description FROM ResolvedQueries;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM categories LEFT JOIN tickets ON categories.category_id = tickets.ticket_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role='Admin';
SELECT response_text FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_type='Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM categories GROUP BY category_name;
